name: KAIDEX
description: KAIDEX V3 is #1 Automated Market-making (AMM) Decentralized Exchange (DEX) on KardiaChain, a leading blockchain ecosystem in South East Asia. KAIDEX V3 is designed to supercharge Total Value Locked (TVL) on the KardiaChain Network and strives to be community-focused organization.

name: Aboat Entertainment
description: Aboat Entertainment is connecting the web3/blockchain space with online entertainment products. This is to make the web3 more accessible to the mainstream while giving creators and consumers new ways of monetization in a fun and safe environment
descriptionHTML:
With Aboat Entertainment we aim to revolutionize the Entertainment Market and make it more accessible for newcomers. On the same note we want to bring creators and their communities a bit Closer, by bringing new and unique monetization possibilities for both sides, the creator and the consumer. Another Topic for us is to create a safe environment for Crypto-Newbies to explore the many possibilities Blockchain can offer without them to have to worry about scam or the entry barrier into blockchain. We do this by implementing gamification in our infrastructure to incentivize users to explore features and content creators while providing feedback.

Core features:

  • Integrated monetization (reward system) for creators and consumers
  • Staking-based subscription model
  • Creator NFTs to sell different content rights at different content stages
  • NFT Marketplace
  • Dual reward system to make it possible for creators to submit their own tokens as rewards
  • Creator Ranking System to incentivize the discovery of newcomers
  • Quest-System to incentivize the discovery further and help crypto newbies get a hang of web3 features
  • Entertainment Platforms like Talkaboat, our Podcast Platform

The first product of Aboat Entertainment is a podcast platform called Talkaboat, which is in development for more than a year now. Just recently we successfully started the alpha test on KardiaChain Testnet to ensure a seamless start on Mainnet. We also released the alpha of our mobile app on Google Play Store and Apple App Store to bring you the listening and earning experience wherever you are.

You can check the technical roadmap here which is regularly updated.

As for the token, we decided to set a relatively high maximum amount of 1,000,000,000,000 to make the reward system feel psychologically more rewarding.

40% of these tokens will be minted over the next 30 years from our staking system.

For more information about our token and it’s tokenomics you can visit our document.

name: gINFO
description: As a winner of the KardiaChain Pioneer Program, kardiainfo.com is about to launch a huge update which will introduce a new token - governance INFO (gINFO). gINFO and INFO will create a mutually beneficial symbiosis where the holders of both tokens benefit the most.
descriptionHTML:
Kardia info is a dApp on the KardiaChain network that provides services targeted at both users and businesses.

Services such as:

  • The on-chain oracle used by dApps on the KAI network
  • The mini-game franchise
  • Tokens Dashboard (CMC for KAI)
  • Telegram Bot
  • Staking (including staking as a service for other dApps)
  • Farming

 

All of these services have been quite successful over the time Kardia info and its token INFO existed.

Now it’s time to introduce a huge update to the platform - governance.

Governance allows users to take control over the decision making process of a dApp through generating ideas and voting on their implementation.

Kardia info will do this with the introduction of the gINFO (governance INFO) token which will have its own unique use case and will form a symbiosis with the already existing INFO token making holding both of them more attractive.

 

With gINFO the following services will be introduced:

Treasury: A fund that gINFO holders vote on how to use with the main goal of burning as much INFO and gINFO as possible.

Bonds: A means of filling up the treasury and creating protocol owned liquidity.

Game profit sharing: gINFO holders can stake KAI or INFO to profit from the highly lucrative mini-games on the Kardia info website.

gINFO Locker: A way to earn weak-hand tax and participate in the governance of Kardia info.

Decentralised on-chain oracle mining: ability to receive rewards for maintaining the kardia info oracle making it more secure. (later down the line).

Making Kardia info more decentralised and community owned, effectively turning it into a Decentralised Autonomous Organisation (DAO).

________________

The goal for the gINFO IDO is to raise $150,000 worth of KAI which will be split between the treasury and the initial liquidity.

name: AMETA
description: Ameta is a farming blockchain-based game created by a strong DEV team from Alphaway who have been experienced in creating multiple successful traditional games. Players will be able to participate in exciting activities such as cleaning up the old farm, building a new farm to grow crops, raising livestock as well as unlocking buildings and other upgrades.
descriptionHTML:
AMETA – Gateway to farming metaverse

Ameta is a farming blockchain-based game created by a strong DEV team from Alphaway who have been experienced in creating multiple successful traditional games. Players will be able to participate in exciting activities such as cleaning up the old farm, building a new farm to grow crops, raising livestock as well as unlocking buildings and other upgrades.

With a unique combination of attractive elements, task systems, and items of the traditional games and blockchain-based game platform, Ameta is confident in bringing a blend of real life and a virtual world for all. This is home for all gamers to connect and make friends through our jam-packed activities in game.

Key features:

  • Free to play
  • Inclusive GameFi and SocialFi metaverse
  • Exciting gameplay
  • Virtual Reality
  • Socialization
  • Personalization
  • Create to earn

 

Product overview:

  • Experience the metaverse world from every dimension including farming, fishing, trading, renting, PVE co-op, Fun PVP events.
  • Fishing rods NFTs ecosystem
  • Real-time simulation (weather, seasons)
  • Customize personal character, mood, and energy
  • NFT tools
  • NFT skins and rewards
  • NFT rewards

 

To encourage traditional players to join and benefit from blockchain, AMETA Tokenomics focuses on solving 2 main problems:

  • Remove all technical barriers for traditional users to own APLUS tokens.
  • Buy NFT items directly from fiat money.
  • Token Name: Ameta Token
  • Ticker: APLUS
  • Total Supply: 1.000.000.000

 

AMETA aims to deploy APLUS token on multi-chain which includes: Kardiachain, BNB Chain & OKC with the support of Multichain Protocol to help users have the easiest cross-chain interactions. Among project partners and backers such names as AWS, Telesign, KAI, ONUS, OKC, Pinksale, LuxPaD, Gagarin etc.

name: SHOPDI
description: Shopdi is a new-generation e-commerce platform specializing in authentic and limited-edition merchandise. Through the Hidden Price mechanism, the selling price of products on Shopdi is determined by the number of interested people.
descriptionHTML:
The inspiration for the development of Shopdi was served by the 25giay.vn website, a cutting-edge e-commerce platform that was previously egregious years ago. Through a seamless, unified cross-border shopping system that brings together all of the key E-commerce industry players in one location, our development team has been working to alter the perception of the global e-commerce market.

Our most significant recent accomplishments include building a shopping to-earn platform on top of our cross-border e-commerce platform already in place, focusing on more upscale brands and products, and integrating nextgeneration blockchain technology, decentralized finance (DeFi), cryptocurrency payments, and tokenized incentives into our traditional package of e-commerce solution.

Unlike other platforms, Shopdi will be organized differently, featuring a cross-border e-commerce platform that is fully socially integrated, supplemented by shopper-centric incentive design and improved postpurchase experience. Shopdi is the first e-commerce platform for high-end, high-value product companies where customers can set their own prices. By utilizing the "Hidden Price" and "Unlimited Discount" mechanisms, Shopdi enables Buyers to choose the product's price without compromising the Sellers' ability to make a profit and establish their brand.

In addition to conventional payment methods, we introduce SHOD tokens to Shopdi ecosystem, as well as alternative cryptocurrency payment options to bring cutting-edge user experience as well as new benefits to social shoppers and crypto users. The SHOD tokens can be used for loyalty and activeness rewards, discounts, platform governance, and other usages.

Sooner or later, crypto users will be able to experience shopping mining, cashback, and expedited delivery without having to open accounts or convert their digital assets into actual money. This will include major e-commerce marketplaces that take cryptocurrency as payment. With Shopdi, we will create a socially engaging ecosystem of users, micro-influencers, high-profile figures, reputable luxury companies, and service providers who share the same interests and advantage.

Regarding the creation and development of Shopdi, we want to brighten the future of online shopping toward crypto-commerce and eventually turn it into a SocialFi Commerce Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO). We develop a unique decentralized business
model that rewards platform users fairly and promotes community purchasing from consumers all over the world while boosting the token's liquidity. Holders of tokens will act as our supporters and evangelists, building a worldwide community that can maintain itself over time and continue to expand. Buyers, sellers, and customers will all contribute significantly to the development and improvement of Shopdi as well as the expansion of the business.

Shopdi is also built on KardiaChain with a tight partnership to further its ecosystem.

For more information about our project, you can visit: https://shopdi.io/

Token Name: SHOD

  • Chain: KRC20
  • Token Standard: KRC-20
  • Total supply: 500,000,000
  • Initial Market Cap: $56,000
  • For more information about our Tokennomic, you can visit: https://shopdi.io/#shopdi-tokenomics
